description: Your new go-to. These softshell alpine climbing pants are built with a 4-way stretch, hyper-durable double weave fabric to navigate unforgiving environments without breaking a sweat. Built to stand up to years of abuse in extreme conditions–and with essential features like a built-in belt, secure zippered thigh pockets, and a streamlined cuff cinch–these are essential for your next predawn start.
name: Mountain Hardwear Chockstone Alpine Pants, Long - Mens

specs.value: Double Weave Soft Shell - 92% Nylon, 8% Elastane
